name: Employed foreign-born college graduates, by broad degree field, country of birth, and broad occupation: 2021
description: Employed foreign-born college graduates, by broad degree field, country of birth, and broad occupation: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: degree_field_and_country_of_birth
variableMeasured.description: Degree field and country of birth hierarchy

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Numbers are rounded to the nearest 1,000. Detail may not add to total because of rounding. For each broad degree field, data are presented for the 25 countries with the largest numbers of foreign-born college graduates employed in the United States during the survey reference week. Data include noncitizen college graduates who are on permanent or temporary visas.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates, 2021.
